headline: US financial firms pledge $1.7 billion to UK ahead of Trump's visit
summary: The investment is expected to create 1,800 jobs across London, Edinburgh, Belfast and Manchester, and deepen transatlantic financial ties, the Department for Business and Trade said.  Bank of America will launch its first operation in Northern Ireland, creating up to 1,000 jobs in Belfast.  Citigroup plans to invest 1.1 billion pounds across its UK operations, including a further commitment to growing its presence in Northern Ireland.

headline: Citi Group among US finance firms pledging investment into UK before Trump visit
summary: Companies are also committing to ramp up commercial activity between the US and UK in the coming years.
